/usr/bin/nvcc   -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/path_tracer.dir/src/bvh.cu.o CMakeFiles/path_tracer.dir/src/camera.cu.o CMakeFiles/path_tracer.dir/src/hitable.cu.o CMakeFiles/path_tracer.dir/src/hitable_list.cu.o CMakeFiles/path_tracer.dir/src/main.cu.o CMakeFiles/path_tracer.dir/src/material.cu.o CMakeFiles/path_tracer.dir/src/sphere.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/path_tracer.dir/cmake_device_link.o    -L"/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu"
